getStrategy() - Method in class src.brick_strategies.BrickStrategyFactory
method randomly selects between 5 strategies and returns one CollisionStrategy object which is a RemoveBrickStrategy decorated by one of the decorator strategies, or decorated by two randomly selected strategies, or decorated by one of the decorator strategies and a pair of additional two decorator strategies.
